mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jst_zc_target order by instruct,tmp
SELECT id,target_no,target_name,esp_config,yinzi,instruct FROM jst_zc_target order by instruct,tmp
SELECT * FROM jst_zc_target where dev_type=#{dev_type} order by instruct,tmp
SELECT * FROM jst_zc_target where dev_type=#{dev_type} order by instruct,address
SELECT * FROM jst_zc_target where dev_no=#{dev_no} order by instruct,address
select * from jst_zc_target where dev_type in (select origin_id from jst_zc_cat where org_user=#{orgUser})

select tagname,pv,time from (select tagname,pv,time from gfac order by time desc limit 10000) as t1 group by t1.tagname union all select tagname,pv,time from (select tagname,pv,time from gfwsd order by time desc limit 10000) as t2 group by t2.tagname union all select tagname,pv,time from (select tagname,pv,time from gfups order by time desc limit 10000) as t3 group by t3.tagname union all select tagname,pv,time from (select tagname,pv,time from gfdly order by time desc limit 10000) as t4 group by t4.tagname

select gc.dev_no,gc.target_name,gf.tagname,gf.pv,gf.time from (select tagname,pv,time from (select tagname,pv,time from ${from} order by time desc limit 10000) as t1 group by t1.tagname) gf left join gfcategory gc on gf.tagname=gc.target_no where gc.dev_no is not null and gc.dev_no=#{dev_no}

select gc.dev_no,gc.target_name,gf.tagname,gf.pv,gf.time from (select tagname,pv,time from (select tagname,pv,time from ${from} order by time desc limit 10000) as t1 group by t1.tagname) gf left join gfcategory gc on gf.tagname=gc.target_no where gc.dev_no is not null and gc.dev_no=#{dev_no}

select jzt.id,jzt.dev_type,jzt.dev_no,jzt.target_no,jzt.target_name,jzt.yinzi from jst_zc_target jzt where jzt.target_no like "gf%" and jzt.dev_no in (select dev_no from jst_zc_dev where dev_pos =#{dev_pos}) and jzt.display_mode=3 order by jzt.dev_no,jzt.target_no
